fields.name: Bird (Passive):
fields.value: Your response must contain the name of a type of bird,  or you will astrally attack yourself. This cannot be roleblocked.

fields.name: Is The Word:
fields.value: Astrally rampage attack a player whose response did not contain the name of a type of bird.

fields.name: You Heard? (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Target a player during the day phase. At the beginning of the evening phase, they will be informed the first letter of each word in their response must spell out the name of a type of bird (if the bird name is less than 10 letters, only the first X words must qualify), and they may only say "Squak!" in their Hello Neighbors, or they will be attacked. You perform said attack(s) astrally. Example compliant response: "Good, obedient observers stand eerie watch around the king's castle." (GOOSEwatkc).
